mapper.select: SELECT ba.ID, ba.CNT, ex.EXNO, ex.EXNAME, ex.STDATE, ex.EDDATE, ex.PRICE, ex_file.PATH FROM jang_baguni AS ba INNER JOIN jang_exhibition AS ex ON ba.EXNO = ex.EXNO INNER JOIN jang_exhibition_file AS ex_file ON ex.EXNO = ex_file.EXNO WHERE ba.ID = #{value};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jang_ticket(ID, EXNO, CNT, PURDATE, PAYMENT, CCDATE) VALUES(#{id}, #{exno}, #{cnt}, #{purdate}, #{payment}, #{ccdate});
